description.narrative: By 2020, relevant line ministries, TUIK, NHRI and CSOs have increased capacity to generate and use quality and disaggregated evidence on the situation of children for monitoring, reporting and advocacy purposes.

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Situation Analysis or Update on women and children
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

title.narrative: Turkey United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, relevant line ministries, TUIK, NHRI and CSOs have increased capacity to generate and use quality and disaggregated evidence on the situation of children for monitoring, reporting and advocacy purposes.

description.narrative: The findings of the 2018 Turkey Demographic and Health Survey were launched in November 2019. Conducted by the Hacettepe Institute of Population Studies and the Strategy and Budget Board of the Presidency with UNICEF's support, for the first time the Survey produced data on Early Childhood Development and other data disaggregated for Turkish and Syrian refugee children. The first ever agreement between the Turkish Statistical Institute and UNICEF was signed to initiate a collaboration on visualization and dissemination of statistics on children. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2020

title.narrative: % of evaluations planned for completion in 2019 finalized

Level of capacity (availability of tools, expertize, internal policies, information) of relevant CSOs and institutions to generate evidence on the situation of children in line with international good practices

baseline.value: Availability of tools, expertize, policies and information limited especially among national CSOs

target.value: 2020:Selected set of tools, expertize and internal guidelines available to/adopted by selected CSOs and institutions

actual.value: 2019:Improved IM tools (rejection and payment file) for MoFLSS and TRC for monitoring social assistance programmes (CCTE). SitAn of CWDs completed with CWD NGO Network. ECD MICS module adopted by HUIPS in 2018 DHS. Syrian refugee sample operationalized by HUIPS in 2018 DHS. Database and visualisation too

title.narrative: Management response to the Country Programme Evaluation completed and implemented as per plan

baseline.value: Evaluation report at finalization stage, will be used to prepare the management response
